summary: A web app (PWA) called Shake.com. The user wants the app name updated to 'Shake.com' across the app title, browser tab, and logo.
architectural_notes: App is a PWA (Progressive Web App) deployable to mobile home screens

existing_features.title: Update the browser tab title and all HTML meta tags (including Apple mobile web app title) to use 'Shake.com' instead of the current app name.
Update the PWA manifest (frontend/public/manifest.json) so that 'name' and 'short_name' fields are both set to 'Shake.com'.
Update all visible logo text, app name labels, and header/sidebar branding throughout the frontend UI to display 'Shake.com' instead of the previous app name ('Wrapper AI').

new_feature_requests.summary: Change app name to 'Shake.com' across app title, browser tab, and logo
